mapper.select: /* EduInstDao.selectAplyInfoForm*/ SELECT A.USERID AS APLYID , A.NM AS APLCNT_NM , A.TELNO AS APLY_TELNO , A.EML AS APLCNT_EML , A.MOBLPHON AS APLCNT_MOBLPHON , A.INSTID , B.RGN_CD , SUBSTR(B.RGN_CD,1,2) AS CTPRVN_CD , B.INST_NM , B.INST_TYPE_CD , TYPE_CD.CD_NM , B.RPRSV_NM , B.TELNO AS INST_CNTCT , B.BRNO , B.ADDR , B.ADDR_DTL , A.REG_DT FROM TB_CMM_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_INST B ON A.INSTID =B.INSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_ADDR_CTPRVN ADDR ON B.RGN_CD = ADDR.CTPRVN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD TYPE_CD ON B.INST_TYPE_CD = TYPE_CD.CD WHERE A.USERID = #{aplcntid}
